content: I'm excited to hear that you're planning to hike the Mist Trail to Vernal Fall. I've been enjoying hiking solo lately, and I think this trail will be a great challenge for me. By the way, since my roommate moved out in January, I've been having more time to focus on my personal interests, like hiking and cooking. Speaking of which, do you have any recommendations for camping food or snacks that are lightweight and high in energy?
